item.title: Why Language Technology
item.description: As an enrolled postgraduate in Language Technology, I am really interested in so-called language. (Statistics can also be seen as a subject mainly composed of mathematical language and computer language.) Since I was young, I have had a unique talent that words can make me have “synaesthesia”: Each word conjures specific meanings and paints vivid images in my mind. To me, the world is a vast tapestry woven from words, grammar, sounds, and their endless combinations, each giving rise to different genres and expressions.

item.title: Why Timeless Song
item.description: This is my first post, and I am happy to start my blogging journey from here. During my bachelor’s study in Statistics, I begin to analyze data with renowned Iris dataset, which has plenty of features to be classified, summarized and visualized. item.title: Classic Card Game with Dialogue-driven Interaction
item.description: Welcome to 24 POINTs! This is my final project for the master course Dialogue System 1, and It’s a card game with dialogue-driven interaction. Web Platform based Backend Technology Node.js (LTS version) Package Manager: Yarn Azure service for ASR&TTS&NLU Frontend Technologies JavaScript (Xstate, vue.js framework) azure.js ‚Äì export relevant KEY dm.js ‚Äì manage dialogue-driven interaction main.js ‚Äì control the main logic and flow of the game HTML index.html ‚Äì the main entry point of the application, containing the structure and layout of the web page

item.title: Data Modeling Analysis of Tesla Charging Stations
item.description: This is our group’s submission for Problem D in 2018 MCM/ICM, and it earned Meritorious Winner at last. I was responsible for the data scraping, cleaning and modeling. Background Problem D: Out of Gas and Driving on E (for electric, not empty) For both environmental and economic reasons, there is global interest in reducing the use of fossil fuels, including gasoline for cars. Whether motivated by the environment or by the economics, consumers are starting to migrate to electric vehicles.
